jobs.title: Sales Development Representative (SDR) For SaaS Chrome Extension
jobs.description:
Swordfishapp.com is looking for a Sales Development Representative (SDR). 

Requirements:

• Strong technical understanding
• Active listening / “problem-seeking” skills
• Patient 
• Helpful 

Location:
Preferably United Kingdom - Surrey <-> Dorset 
Or Remote

Pros:
Remote flexible 2-3 weeks per month
Base + Enterprise Level commission
